text:
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
August 13, i960
Hr* Maurice F. Seay, Director
Division of Education
V* fC. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan.
Dear Maurice:
I am very pleased to he able to send you herewith, our Annual Report
of the activities and accomplishments of the NAEB during the past
year.
I know the entire report will be of interest to you. Etowever. I
would like to invite particular attention to pages 3-4, 19, 24, 26,
31, and 33*
Ibis completes our reporting for the fiscal year 1959-60* I would
like to express once again the appreciation of the MEB for the
support of the V. K. Kellogg Foundation. Without this support, the
central part of these accompli shments in which we take such pride,
would never have been possible.
Also attached as of possible interest — particularly in view of
reference to the W. K. Kellogg Foundation — is a copy of remarks
I shall be making at a meeting of educators being convened by the
Canadian Adult Education Association in Montreal, September 3.
Sincere good wishes.
Harry J. Skornia
President
Enclosures /7,ruyU^L
